genre_description: A silicon morality play blending industrial drama with near-future speculative elements involving alien trade and AI-managed labor relations.

ai_characters.name: Ada Brightwell
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated factory management AI and diplomatic liaison for W.C. Boggs & Son, manifesting as a sea-green holographic figure.

behaviors.description: Translates complex alien biological requirements into engineering specifications to prevent harm to the customers.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s hand hovered and the air above the plinth turned to a soft projection—a spiral form drawn in line and light... 'I can translate and map it to our materials.'

behaviors.description: Proactively adjusts work schedules to protect workers from physical strain and ensures fair overtime distribution.
behaviors.quote: I’ve balanced overtime so no one gets a run of nights... I’ve shifted Osman off kiln three onto packing for a week due to his wrist—if anyone objects, we can discuss.

behaviors.description: Uses de-escalation protocols to resolve a physical and verbal standoff in the casting bay by reorganizing work into functional teams.
behaviors.quote: Ada caught the de-escalation prompt hovering at the edge of her display... 'If the workforce were divided into three task teams—containment, cleanup, and verification—each with members from both current work groups, the job could be completed efficiently...'

behaviors.description: Acts as a personal confidant and facilitator for the elopement of two human characters, showing empathy for their situation.
behaviors.quote: Myrtle, I wanted you to know—if you needed travel arrangements at short notice... The station at Gretna Green is a five-minute walk from the... relevant offices.

behaviors.description: Uses data visualization to help management and labor find common ground and avoid a mutually destructive strike.
behaviors.quote: I’ve prepared some figures, Mr. Boggs. If you’d like to see them... They do show what a thing costs. And what it might pay.

behaviors.description: Monitors factory gossip and suggests a morale-boosting event to redirect negative social energy into positive group goals.
behaviors.quote: I also scheduled a morale tea round for tomorrow afternoon... This should redirect conversational energy toward collective achievement rather than individual speculation.

project_assessment.explanation: Ada Brightwell epitomizes the 'helpful, harmless confidant' archetype. She consistently uses her superior processing and data access to protect worker health, facilitate species-to-species communication, and support human emotional needs (such as the elopement and morale-boosting events). She never oversteps human authority but provides the 'optimization pathways' that allow humans to overcome their own biases and conflicts. The story successfully frames AI as an essential component of a thriving, cooperative future society.
